contest-event.event-date:
April 27, 2003 D Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section B)
Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section B) 20 Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest Holme Valley Brass Band Contest holme-valley-brass-band-contest-section-b
Civic Hall, Holmfirth
Hymn tune - 1st Old Silkstone, 2nd Boarshurst. 4 bands competed.
Oct. 10, 2013, 3:11 p.m. Sept. 24, 2015, 3:02 p.m.
1 Old Silkstone Norman Law
2 Boarshurst Silver Band Jonathon Webster
3 Meltham and Meltham Mills Band Stuart Fawcett
4 Huddersfield Brass Ensemble I. Tiffany
Withdrawn Slaithwaite Band Unknown
